title: The Fallout
description: Just because she has wings, doesn’t mean she’s an Angel…It's front page news on every Angel gossip rag:“Marcus & Ameana: Gone The Way Of “Brad & Jennifer.”So, Who Is The “Angelina?” Emmy Baxter—a mere mortal!”Ameana tries to avoid her ex and his new love by focusingon the other evil out to destroy the team. But soon her painturns to fury.And before the end…a girl plots revenge, a leader is on the edge and an Angel falls.
author: Lola St. Vil
